job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: Position Data AnalystbrDuration 4 monthsbrLocation New York NY 10020 Remote as of now may go hybrid when office reopensbrPay rate 60hr on w2brbrbrJob descriptionbr4 years professional experience and comfort working with large data sets requiredbrProficiency in Tableau SQL Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint are requiredbrExperience with traditional TV and digital measurement  Adobe highly preferredbrBachelors degree or equivalent in marketing communications economics statistics or related fieldbrAttention to detail accuracy organization strong problemsolving skills and exceptional work ethic are essentialbrAble to communicate complex ideas stories and datasets graphically as well as verballybrAbility to collaborate and work closely with other parts of the business as well as external partnersbrCapable of prioritizing multiple projects and adhoc requests while thriving in a fastpaced environmentbrSelfstarter resourceful flexible proactive  a true teamplayer who is willing to pitch in wherever neededbrPassion for the entertainment industry and television programmingbr
